channel.title: ASSAM on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content in ASSAM on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India

item.title: Assam: Sanctuaries of the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Jewels of the east Brahmaputra valley of Assam, is the geographical heart of northeastern India.

item.title: ASSAM: Family escape to the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Family exploration of the Brahmaputra Valley The setting for this family holiday is the lush Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Around the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Hills, Valleys, Forests, Rivers and Tribes Starting from central Assam we make our war east and north along the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: The Brahmaputra Valley explorer
item.description: Cycling the physical heart of Northeastern India This tour takes you cycling along the length of the Brahmaputra River, across parts of Assam and Arunachal Pradesh.
